room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Breakout is such a fun experience! We had the best time in the Mystery Mansion.. so many fun things to explore and discover, and just when you think it's over, there is more fun to come!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: One of the best breakout games ever! My team broke out, so that made it even better. They have a huge variety of games which was super cool too. A little hard to find when you don't know the area, but we found it. Maybe if they put up a bigger sign that would help.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Mystery Mansion is definitely not for beginners! It's full of surprises, and 3 hints didn't seem like enough! Just about every minor detail of the room was needed to breakout. Even though my group and I didn't escape, I'll definitely be back. And Sophia, our game master, was awesome!
